channel.title: ESP32 on SwiSwiSwift
channel.description: Recent content in ESP32 on SwiSwiSwift

item.title: Using the RTC module with ESP32
item.description: I tried to use the RTC module with ESP32 and got a little stuck, so I wrote about it. To conclude, I solved the problem

item.title: Reading and writing text files on SD cards with ESP32
item.description: This is a sample of reading and writing a text file saved in an SD card with ESP32. I couldn't find much simple sample code
